main.name: Odeane Croney
main.occupation: I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer based in Stockholm, Sweden.
main.bio: I am an ambitious software developer filled with excitement, dedication and passion for the craft. I am open-minded and eager to learn new things. I am a great team player with the ability to also work independently. I am seeking the opportunity to work in an enthusing, diverse and challenging work environment.

Bidspace.name: Bidspace
Bidspace.details: An appliction built using react and ruby on rails. The app is about providing a platform to people who is looking for a parking space to rent or trying to rent out their available parking space.

CraftAcademy.name: Craft Academy Coding Bootcamp
CraftAcademy.info: An accelerated learning bootcamp. The curriculum consisted of build complex real-world applications and teaching the students the skills they need to go off and work in the real world.

university.name: University of Technology, Jamaica
university.info: Faculty of Natural & Applied Science. Studied Forensic Chemistry

programming.title: Programming
programming.info: The abiltiy to solve problems and build scalable applications. I am also capable of pair programming which I enjoy doing very much.

agile.title: Agile software development
agile.info: I attained experience participating in daily scrums, being a scrum master and developing application following the agile manifesto principles.

tests.title: Test driven development
tests.info: I have gain tremendous experience in writing unit and feature tests for all the real world applications built during the bootcamp.

versioncontrol.title: Version control
versioncontrol.info: I have experience in using git and github. I use github and git when pair programming and personally to track changes in my sorce code during development.
